website_summaries.verdict: Versatile, flexible and offered in a rainbow of hues bound to match your kitchen.
pros: High quality silicone won't stain, mold, mildew or absorb odors
Thicker than other brands of silicone kitchen pads
Comes in coral red, dark grey, fall orange, fuchsia, lime green, mustard yellow, navy blue and teal

customer_reviews.title: Heat Transfers, small and thin
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps these have a lot of nice useful features as others have mentioned, but I bought these for the purpose of removing hot items from my oven . So far, every time I've done that, I've had to VERY quickly move them somewhere so that I don't burn my hand. They are not very thick, and kind of small too. I worry I'm going to burn myself every time I use them. I'll keep searching...
customer_reviews.author: debhibb

customer_reviews.title: OK as trivets, maybe.
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be made well and would probably last quite a while. They might be okay as trivets. I was not happy with them as potholders though. They were quite cumbersome to use and did allow heat to transfer to my hands. They were not large enough to put under a container in the microwave to then use to carry the item out. I will be returning them and go back to my home made potholders. I was really hoping they would work so am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CMB

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-purpose kitchen utensil
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for opening jars. I make kombucha and after the secondary fermentation process, the jars are often under so much pressure, they are very difficult to open. These have helped tremendously with this purpose, and I've actually been using them for spoon rests, to put hot tea pots, or hot pans on while cooking. They wash up perfectly and seem more durable than some of the other brands I've tried. I noticed no weird smells. Great multi-purpose kitchen utensil!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Matney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Trivets!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these trivets to use with my new induction stove. I love them! They clean up very nicely in the dishwasher and are a great size. I purchased four of them so I could always have two on the counter to use as trivets and I use the other two for potholders. The thickness is very adequate--I have not been burned using them as hot pads and they are very flexible. If the need arose, I'd definitely purchase them again; however, I can't imagine these wearing out anytime soon--they appear to be very durable. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: QueenB

customer_reviews.title: Can feel heat right thru it so be careful.
customer_reviews.text: Grab a cookie sheet and the heat comes right thru, maybe it's me but I don't like them.
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: Awesome in every way, though they take a little while to get used to
customer_reviews.text: I love these. For someone coming from traditional pot holders, using these was at first jarring. The first few times I used them I was convinced that they would burn my fingers through. Thankfully, no such thing happened and I began to love them. The build quality is great, they're thick enough that they feel like they should last a long time. I also really appreciate the different texture on each side. The absolute BEST thing about these pot holders though is the fact that I can use them in the freakin' dishwasher. Super rad.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Nickl

customer_reviews.title: Yas!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worth it! I’ve had these for months now, I use them almost every time I cook! They can be used to open jar lids. They are a nice bright color. Seem good quality and durable. Also a plus is they are so easy to clean compared to some wicker type ones I’ve had in the past. Just run under water with a dab of soap and all that spaghetti sauce you accidentally dropped on it comes right off. Happy to find something that seems it would be a smart addition in the kitchen and it actually is and isn’t just another gimmic. Very happy with my purchase. Want to buy more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to like?
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I can use them for trivets or hot pads. They can also assist with opening jars. I use them like coasters sometimes too if I have something bigger than a glass. Like a bowl of ice cream or cereal while watching tv. They are attractive enough to hang in your kitchen wall if you want. There is a hole in one corner to do that. Plus dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: LuAnn

customer_reviews.title: Potholder? No.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace some old cloth potholders. To use these as potholders is asking for trouble.They are bulky and hard to safely control hot items and to me that is a BIG safety concern. Use as a trivet. I went back to using the old style cloth potholders that Granny makes.
customer_reviews.author: Hermit Hank

customer_reviews.title: Awful and do not work
customer_reviews.text: Awful... these transfer heat easily. Even taking something out of the oven at 255 degrees, these couldn't handle the heat and made me feel like I was touching the pan with my bare hands. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fitz

customer_reviews.title: LIME GREEN Set of (2) Premium, 5 in 1 Multipurpose Silicone Kitchen Tool ★ Trivet, Pot Holder, Jar Opener --ROCKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I LOVE THESE-- They're BRIGHT, Happy (I Bought the LIME Green Silicone Trivets!;)!!!), FUN!, Functional, and Absolutely Fabulous!!! With the One Day Shipping, Mine just happened to Arrive as I was heating dinner and the Timer went Off!!!! Purrfect!!! I Love them-- really do! They work just fine!! I was able to set my HOT baking pan upon the Trivet, which was the perfect size for the baking dish, accommodated the HEAT, and definitely made me SMILE!!! Would I recommend these to a friend????? Most definitely!!! In fact, I may purchase MORE!!!! I especially LIKE Finding a bright, happy, festive, Vibrant LIME Green in Silicone. Some of other styles/brands offer bland shades of green. This set has pizzaz!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yogini

customer_reviews.title: Wow! wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: How versatile can a piece of silicon be? It turns out it can very versatile! I never knew how badly I needed a new potholder/jar opener/trivet/drip tray until this bad boy arrived. First, there was no smell at all, which sometimes does happen with man made products. This is super study and I love the grey color...classy! This is literally the best jar opener I have ever used. I have had trouble for years, but suddenly I have amazing grip ability when using this product. I have also used it several times as a potholder and I am amazed at how little heat gets through. A wonderful find! Everyone needs this!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Would buy them again!
customer_reviews.text: Just like the headline says 'Would buy them again', IT IS TRUE! I would and I will once we are settled in to our new place! They do there duty with putting things in the oven and taking them out. As well as bring over a dish to sit them on, takes the heat to where it's not so hot or barely noticeable on the table that the hot food was even there.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bellemore

customer_reviews.title: Flexible, multi-purpose trivets and potholders
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I use them for pot holders and trivets. These are more flexible than other silicone trivets I have but just as sturdy and heat proof. I like them as potholders because they give a firm grip. I have placed very hot pots on them wth no damage to the table or counter surface. Due to the "nubs" on them I didn't have much success using these as a garlic peeler (I still prefer my silicone peeler for that). I have not washed them in the dishwasher yet, but they wipe clean easily with a sponge. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MKarwan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold heat good enough.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these trivets, but as other reviews say, the heat passes through. I burned my hand when trying to take a pot out of the oven. It serves no purpose if I can't use it as it is supposed to be used. I really like the way they are made and the silicone feels soft. If only they would hold heat better. Although, if you are very careful and hold them the right way, you can use them for quick hot pot handling.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: A great multipurpose tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful, multipurpose tool, that does the job. It’s easy to clean, and is very useful as a spoon rest, trivet and jar opener. It is also inexpensive. It’s a little less useful as a pot holder, although it can be used as it. However, I find myself using my cloth potholders instead as they are much more easy to fold and grab handles with.
customer_reviews.author: John Arena

customer_reviews.title: Heat resistance is not great
customer_reviews.text: Liked the colors and arrived in good condition. They wash up easy too. But the heat resistance is terrible. If I pull a pan out of the oven I can’t hold it long with these. So I’ve burnt myself more than once when I pulled a pan out and had no where to immediately set it. Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ramie Yesh

customer_reviews.title: BEST THING SINCE SLICED BREAD!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I've ordered in a long time. I do use them for different things, i.e., jar opener, a "lid" when microwaving, potholder, to protect my tabletop from hot dishes. Love them so much second order is for my son. Love the fact that they can be easily washed. Never use my cloth potholders anymore. I HIGHLY recommend these potholders.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: as a TRIVET-YES! NOT a Great POT Holder
customer_reviews.text: Work well for a trivet, not so much as for "pot holders" the thickness makes it difficult to grab pans out of the oven, they feel akward when grabbing a cookie sheet and tend to "flop" over onto the pan when trying to grab. I will probably stick to regular good ol' Fabric Pot Holder's for the oven and use these silicone ones as trivets. I was hoping to have dual use out of these but they just aren't for me....
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Sew and Sew

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat permanently deformed
customer_reviews.text: Deformed apparently by wrapping prior to complete setting of the silicone. I ran them through the hot dishwasher cycle to see if they would retain the memory. The photo is after the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: Steve C.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, durable, flexible, and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved into a new apartment. Having completely started over, I needed fairly cheap items which were durable and had multiple uses. While searching for trivets I found Love This Kitchen‘s 5 in 1 kitchen too. Whether I need to open a jar, set my cooking utensil (etc) I have what I need. This silicone trivet is versatile, durable, flexible, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Need to be thicker
customer_reviews.text: These are ok but they really need to be thicker so that you don't burn yourself. I'm a fan the silicon pot holders but not so much a fan these particular ones. They're not thick enough to let you grab something tightly and move it much of a distance. They transmit heat and you'll either be letting go suddenly or saying bad words as you sizzle. Either way, it's not a good quality when you're handing a hot pan of lasagna or large pot of boiling water.
customer_reviews.author: Digital Goddess

customer_reviews.title: No more nasty fabric mitts!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! Because my 20 year old son doesn't pay attention, my fabric oven mitts have burn marks & crusty food on them - grosses me out every time I touch them. These little babies solve that problem! Just a quick rinse and they are good to go! They are thick, but still have a lot of maneuverability so you can grab without worry. The nubs on them help with grip so you never feel like the hot dish is going to slip out of your hands. I use them to take casserole dishes out of the oven and set them right on the mats to protect the surface. Convenient & clean!
customer_reviews.author: Ballcamp

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT GIFT FOR SOMEONE SPECIAL OR JUST BUY FOR YOURSELF.
customer_reviews.text: My family and I love this product! I have a small kitchen and counters can so easily get cluttered up with odd items such as trivets, spoon rests, a variety of potholders. No need for those items when you buy these. They are a nice size and will take the place of most of the items mentioned above. They look nice on the counter; easy to clean and easy to grip hot handles. No worry about getting burned as sometimes has happened with the cloth potholders. Just a great product. And...a Great Gift to give or receive.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Em

customer_reviews.title: Every Kitchen Should Have These!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received the yellow set about a week ago and love them! I've used them as trivets, potholders, and jar openers! I'm going to use them in the bottom of my pot to sterilize my canning jars. I plan on getting more sets for myself and giving them to family and friends. Great choice of colors; however, would be nice if they were offered in brown (for my conservative friends). The size of these is just perfect; big enough to do the job without being too big and awkward. Also, the little hole allows me to hang them off the side of my microwave where I have a 3M hook mounted for potholders. Hmmmm, what color should I get next?
customer_reviews.author: Syl

customer_reviews.title: Silicone Trivet mats
customer_reviews.text: Silicone trivet mats are great.... they are truly multi purpose...just this morning , got in a situation that needed immediate response and there in front of me was the MAT.... the answer to my problem ....oh , just loved it. Thank you so much for these mats, they are awesome. And they truly can hold the heat !
customer_reviews.author: cris

customer_reviews.title: Like them better than others, good value!
customer_reviews.text: I think these are better than the others that are listed on here. I bought a few, singular different types, those are good but these are better. First, they give you two not one...so better value Second, there is two different sides, both are good, but the edged side up is great to catch spills!! They work as well as any other out there. Yes they work with very hot pots or pans........but I also use these as hot drink holders as they are better than coasters!
customer_reviews.author: K R TTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Interesting and differant
customer_reviews.text: I am old school and used to cotton/Kevlar pot holders but took a chance on these. I love them so far. Not as bulky and considerably easier to store by recovering real-estate that otherwise would be taken up by traditional pads. I've used them now a couple of times and seems to do the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Use them as pot holders, trivets & spoon rest. Throw them in the dish washer, they take up very little space. I’ve purchased several as gifts. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RZ

customer_reviews.title: The color choices are great.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, the design is just right, however, no matter how many times you tell a person what size an item is, a large picture, with no size comparison shown next to it, will not keep the visual person from thinking that the item that they see is as small as it is stated to be. A trivet is small, a mat can be large. It's a good thing that I purchased more than I thought that needed.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Randall

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty silicone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a trivet. I like that its heavy duty and thicker than another set I bought. Color is true to the picture. I haven't used it as a pot holder.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy412

customer_reviews.title: but was glad I didn't have to move it any further than ...
customer_reviews.text: These are ok for briefly grabbing the handle of an iron skillet, but if you're taking a hot pan out of the oven, be prepared to move quickly. The material is too thin and there's too much room between the dots. I didn't drop the pan, but was glad I didn't have to move it any further than to the stovetop.
customer_reviews.author: C. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: Just baked two trays of cookies which I put on these heat pads straight out of the oven. No issues. Earlier I put a very hot casserole dish on one of these right out of the oven with no issues. They are obviously going to get a lot of use in my kitchen. Nice color and washes up very easily. Threw them both in the dishwasher. Can't get any easier than that.
customer_reviews.author: KazSammy

customer_reviews.title: They are as useful as I imagined though
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I was surprised at the size. The image makes it look bigger than it is. But the size is just a typical size for rivets. They are as useful as I imagined though. I got it in a lightning deal so slightly discounted. Wish I could have gotten another pair at that price. Was so hard to decide what color to go with. I definitely am keeping an eye out for another sale cause I want another 2 so I can have enough to be designated for rivets/potholder/spoon rest.
customer_reviews.author: Betty L.

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like them.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like them. They are easy to clean. They heat up if you do not set the pot or pan from the oven down quickly. They are slippery. There seems to be no grip from the material to the pan. Nearly dropped a pot of boiling water. I guess I can use them to sit hot pots on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are great for hot pads when you need something a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: “Love these! They are great for hot pads when you need something a bit more manageable than a glove. No worries with hot pans on solid surface (or any heat sensitive surface)...these are great. Have thrown out all of the "old" cloth type pads/gloves. These take up less space and are way more heat resistant...no more "hot potato" hands! (They are also great for opening jars that need a good grip).”
customer_reviews.author: JSlag1

customer_reviews.title: You need these! Pick a color and buy them now!
customer_reviews.text: The variety of colors available was great- I wanted a neutral gray, and the color is just as pictured. The silicone trivets are a great size- big enough to protect the counter, but do not take up all the counter space. They stay an place and do not slide around on the tile counter. I am surprised at how much I like them- no more hot pot/pan worries!
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: Burns on my hand.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these due to the good reviews. Unfortunately, while lifting a cast iron pan from the oven to the stove top, I badly burnt my pointer finger. The oven was at 425 degrees, so it should have protected my hand. The burn had a nice circle from the design on the silicone, which makes me think that if the whole thing was thicker, it would have worked. These work well as a trivet but not as protection while lifting or carrying anything hot, especially if it is heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Triple good!!!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product that can be used as a trivet, potholder and jar opener due to the flexibility of the material it is made from. I now use these instead of the "usual" fabric potholders. I got the gray to match my modern kitchen, but think I may be ordering other colors to match my colorful array of fiesta ware dishes.
customer_reviews.author: The Agora

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. Easy to wash, clean, I did not feel I was going to burn myself. And I used it with the grill pans. Color true to what you see
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: Too Slippery For Heavy Pans
customer_reviews.text: As someone who cooks a lot with cast iron, these are terrible as pot holders. The silicone is slippery and it's difficult to handle hot pans. They are okay as trivets, but that is it.
customer_reviews.author: VLB

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: There are not bad. They are just not big or safe enough to use as a pot holder for removing pans from the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Deedra Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT - WANT MORE!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I purchased these! They are perfect for opening jars, using as a trivet and potholders. The color is very vibrant (I purchased orange) and can't wait to order more! Thank you for this wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: LuSee

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect !! Great quality perfect size". I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Geisha Noa

customer_reviews.title: Super good at so many tasks
customer_reviews.text: This mat is a little too thick for me to handle a hot baking dish and feel fully in control...not dangeriously so..I sure I will get the hang of it with use. On the plus side it is useful in so many other ways that makes them a real keeper. This is my second set. It is nicely packaged and will make a nice gift.///Just get the colors right.
customer_reviews.author: J Lochaby

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: It is so pretty hanging on the kitchen wall when not in use. It is hard to take it down and use it. Love the color and the many uses.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and very useful.
customer_reviews.text: These look great and work well. At first I thought they wouldnot because they are not as thinck as my woffle like set. However, they work will and the flexibility comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Thick
customer_reviews.text: Good value and keeps the heat off the table. The suction cup bottom is a little hard to clean if debris gets to them, but can be removed easily if caught fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn

customer_reviews.title: Hate them.
customer_reviews.text: too small and awkward. And does not protect from heat! I can't hold anything with these for more than a couple seconds. And they are hard to hold. Hate them.
customer_reviews.author: McD

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know how bad we needed these until we got them!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, versatile product at a fair price. Easy to clean too... just give it a ride in the dishwasher and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Jacobs Jr.

customer_reviews.title: These are great and very handy
customer_reviews.text: These are great and very handy. I love that I can throw them in the dishwasher . . . my old cloth potholders were so stained and gross after years of use. They are perfect for getting glass bowls out of the microwave and onto the table for dinner and for getting cookie sheets out of the oven. Really glad I bought them!
customer_reviews.author: S. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen accessory
customer_reviews.text: I own three pairs by now. They are easy to clean, sturdy, multipurpose, hard to lose and are very useful on my smooth kitchen table. Fun colors too! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: “Needed to replace current pot holders, was very skeptical about plastic ones- Boy was I ever wrong, these silicone holders are awesome and I am kicking myself for not ordering some years ago. Very well made, thick, nice spoon holder, jar opener, easy to clean, doesn't become deformed or melted when hot pan placed on top. Held extreme heat away from my finger tips too!! Well worth the money.”
customer_reviews.author: Diane M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far.
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. The pot holders seem pretty sturdy and flexible. We bought them to use as trivets, so we wouldn't ruin our new counter tops. They seem to be doing the job so far. One of the sides is also nice to put something wet or leaking on (for example our water pitcher, that sometimes spills over), that way the water stays within the trivet, rather than going all over the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Not a great oven mitt.
customer_reviews.text: These are great I like that they are multi functional. I have used them as spoon rests and trivets. I wasn’t impressed when I used them as oven mitts. Not enough coverage for my hands and they did get hot. Easy to just throw in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Julias Mom

customer_reviews.title: They're trivets. They're potholders. They're jar openers. They're awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rave enough about these trivets. I like them so much that I bought an extra set for myself and a set as a gift for my sister who is now also in love with them. They are a breeze to clean. Just toss them in the dishwasher. So many beautiful colors to choose from. Their soft texture makes them excellent potholders, and their little nubblies make them perfect for opening jars. Seriously, I wish I had an excuse to buy another set, but I have a small kitchen and two sets are probably enough.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa M.

customer_reviews.title: Great silicone mats!
customer_reviews.text: I love these silicone trivet mats! I got the gray and they are a very nice color as pictured. They can really take the heat, so you don't burn your hands. I also use 2 of them on the table to put hot casserole dishes to protect my wood dining room table. They work great!
customer_reviews.author: Roman Urbanski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent useful product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have them on my counter beside my stove. I can use them as pot holders, or hotpads. I bought them mainly to be used as hot pads to protect my counter. I may end up ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: L. Murray

customer_reviews.title: GREAT multipurpose tool
customer_reviews.text: GREAT multipurpose tool! i've used it as a spoon rest, trivet, coaster, tried it as an opener, pot holder and to pull things out of the oven. washes clean too. i wish however that there were some sort of thumb slot or strap at the corners so that when i am using it as a over mitt too it has some more security. otherwise completely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Su

customer_reviews.title: Height
customer_reviews.text: Wish a bit bigger in height where the bottom pieces are located.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Look good and work great!
customer_reviews.text: These things are much nicer than the traditional cloth material hot pads. They look and feel of good quality. We got 2 grey and to turquoise colored to match the theme of our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Scowil

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: You'll feel the heat if you hold a hot item for an extended period of time. Otherwise, they are useful in many different ways.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Hepburn

customer_reviews.title: The last pot holders you’ll need
customer_reviews.text: So glad I found these, I’ve thrown out my other pot holders.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: Great Potholders
customer_reviews.text: I have found them very useful. I never have to worry about washing potholders, just put them in the top rack of the dishwasher. These are even better than ones I had before; they are thicker and I don't expect to have them tear around the hole. They are a bit pricey for potholders, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Upstate Oma

customer_reviews.title: Thin but great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was worried because they are so thin! But after using them a few times I really like them. I like that they are thin because it’s easy to handle whatever you are trying to grab. I love that I can use them for multiple purposes. Love the bright color.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Best to use for EVERYTHING hot~~ and MORE!!
customer_reviews.text: There is NOTHING to dislike about these Trivet/Pot Holders!! I am using them for EVERYTHING!!! I have used them for under my pots/pans, I use them under my Himalayan Salt lamps, as they can get warm, causing some of the crystals to fall as the lamp gets warm. There are so many uses for these Trivet/Pot holders! I am purchasing more to give as gifts! Who can possibly live without them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Third sets a charm...really!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my beach home, my daughter loved them so much I bought for her and now I have them in my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These silicone mats does everything. Soft and flexible for use as a pot holder but perfect as a trivet and jar opener. Trying to simplify my kitchen and this is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lmkd

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean!
customer_reviews.text: We've used these in our RV for two tips now. They've held up to the oven heat in the RV when getting things out. What's even better is they wash up so easily!
customer_reviews.author: Andy H.

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS!
customer_reviews.text: These are FABULOUS! No more grungy dirty hot pads for me! If something spills on them I just wash them off in the sink with a little warmth soapy water. Wish you made them in a larger oblong size to accommodate a cake pan or casserole dish!!
customer_reviews.author: ShopGirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice for as oven mits
customer_reviews.text: This is great quality but not what I expected it’s more for holding hot pans. Could be used a trivet mat, if was more solid.
customer_reviews.author: Kade

customer_reviews.title: Not So Hot
customer_reviews.text: Too flimsy to use for much of anything and difficult to hold hot items. Poorly designed!
